control.description-key: Displays upcoming and overdue events in card format for Matter/Project Overview tabs. Shows actionable items with event type badges and days-until-due indicators.

property.name: parentRecordId
property.description-key: The ID of the parent record (Matter or Project) to filter events

property.name: parentEntityName
property.description-key: The logical name of the parent entity (sprk_matter or sprk_project)

property.name: maxItems
property.description-key: Maximum number of events to display in the widget

property.name: daysAhead
property.description-key: Number of days to look ahead for upcoming events (default: 30)

property.name: selectedEventOutput
property.description-key: JSON output when an event card is clicked (eventId, eventType)
